title: BOC admin view MJ Contract Statistics batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the MJC stat batch link
custom_expected:
THEN available batch parameters fields will display and function in a widget at the top of the batch screen
AND Mode and Run As dropdown fields will display and function in batch parameters widget
AND Run and Back buttons will appear and function
AND widgets follow wireframe and AC

title: BOC admin navigates back to batches screen from MJC stat batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a specific batch's screen (MJ Stat Batch)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close on the batch parameters widget
custom_expected: THEN user is returned to the Batch screen

title: BOC admin runs MJC stat batch in update mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the batch parameters widget on the MJC stat batch screen 
AND has selected 'update' from mode dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN stat batch will run
AND Batch will check for errors
AND All contracts that meet requirements will be updated on the front end

title: BOC admin runs MJC stat batch in official mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to MJC stat batch screen
AND has selected 'Official' in Run As dropdown 
AND Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN statistics from the this year and any prior years that have not been marked official will be calculated, and official checkbox will be checked  on the front end. 
AND Statistic based bonuses that have been marked official cannot be recalculated if the batch runs again.

title: Check clauses were marked official
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has run the MJC Stat batch in official mode
custom_steps: WHEN user checks updated contract clauses that meet the stat batch

title: BOC admin runs MJC stat batch in nightly mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the MJC stat batch screen
AND has selected nightly from Run As dropdown 
AND Update Mode
custom_expected: THEN all statistics based bonuses that have not been official will be checked

title: Check clauses were not marked official
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has run the mjc stat batch as nightly
custom_steps: WHEN the user checks the contract clauses met the stat batch
custom_expected: THEN they are not marked official

title: BOC user can edit Season Days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD is viewing the Payroll tab of an approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN they click edit, updates Season dates fields, and click save
custom_expected: THEN the changes they made will save successfully

title: Club user cannot edit Season Days
custom_steps: WHEN Club views Payroll tab of an approved contract from their org
custom_expected: THEN they will not have an edit button

title: BOC can only enter whole numbers
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user is editing Season Days
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters decimals and clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN they will receive and error that they must enter whole numbers

title: BOC can only enter up to 199
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user is editing season days
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user enters 200 in a field and clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN they will receive an error that only 199 will be allowed

title: LRD can see if any values have been modified
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD has made edits to season days
custom_expected: THEN the number will be highlighted to indicate that a change was made

title: Payroll Tab appears when contract is approved
As of date depends on which is earlier - Terms Confirmed or Signing Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved contract with the Terms Confirmed date BEFORE the signing date
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the As of Date will be the same as the Terms confirmed date. (will always be the earlier date of the two)

title: As of date depends on which is earlier - Terms Confirmed or Signing Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved contract with the Signing Date BEFORE the Terms Confirmed date
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the As of Date will be the same as the Signing Date (will always be the earlier date of the two)

title: BOC can view LRD 40- Man Payroll Impact on Payroll Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved Contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the LRD 40- Man Payroll Impact section will display

title: BOC can view CBT Impact on Payroll tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the Payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the CBT Impact section will display
